summary: This document outlines the terms of the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2014 Trust, detailing the roles of the Grantor and Trustees, provisions for disbursement of income and principal, specific bequests, and the administration of the trust. It establishes the rights of the Grantor during his lifetime and the distribution of assets after his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the trust, establishing its terms and conditions.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is one of the Trustees responsible for administering the trust as per the Grantor's directives.

persons.name: James E. Staley
persons.context: James E. Staley serves as a Trustee, tasked with managing the trust's assets and distributions.

persons.name: David Mitchell
persons.context: David Mitchell is another Trustee involved in the administration of the trust.

persons.name: Karyna Shuliak
persons.context: Karyna Shuliak is named as a beneficiary of the trust, entitled to a specific bequest.

persons.name: Lesley Katherine Groff
persons.context: Lesley Katherine Groff is listed as a beneficiary who will receive a specific bequest from the trust.

persons.name: Lawrence Paul Visoski, Jr.
persons.context: Lawrence Paul Visoski, Jr. is mentioned as a beneficiary entitled to a specific bequest.

persons.name: Eva Andersson Dubin
persons.context: Eva Andersson Dubin is named as a beneficiary who will receive distributions from the trust under certain conditions.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein appointed Darren K. Indyke as a Trustee of his trust.
James E. Staley is appointed as a Trustee by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
David Mitchell serves as a Trustee appointed by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Darren K. Indyke and James E. Staley serve together as Trustees of the trust.
Darren K. Indyke and David Mitchell are both Trustees managing the trust.
James E. Staley and David Mitchell are co-Trustees of the trust.
Karyna Shuliak is a beneficiary of the trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Lesley Katherine Groff is a beneficiary named in the trust by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Lawrence Paul Visoski, Jr. is a beneficiary of the trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Eva Andersson Dubin is a beneficiary who will receive distributions from the trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein.

keyFacts: The trust agreement was executed on November 18, 2014.
Jeffrey E. Epstein serves as the Grantor of the trust.
Darren K. Indyke, James E. Staley, and David Mitchell are appointed as Trustees.
Specific monetary bequests are made to various individuals, including Karyna Shuliak and Lesley Katherine Groff.
Eva Andersson Dubin is named as a beneficiary who will receive distributions from the trust.
